#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else 
	return
	gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{
	long long t,x1,x2,y1,y2,a,b,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		a=abs(y2-y1);
		b=abs(x2-x1);
		k=gcd(a,b)-1;
		cout<<k<<endl;
		
	
	}
	return 0;
}
